message.content:
Analyze the build configuration and routing setup to understand:
1. How HomePage.tsx is compiled and used
2. Check vite.config file
3. Check if there are multiple HomePage files and which one is actually being used
4. Check the routing configuration to see which HomePage is imported
5. Look for any build or compilation issues

Focus on finding why changes to HomePage.tsx are not reflected in the running application.

content.text: I'll help you analyze the build configuration and routing setup to understand why HomePage.tsx changes aren't being reflected. Let me start by exploring the codebase systematically.

content.content: No files found

content.text: Now let me check the routing configuration and the HomePage.tsx file:

content.content:
1→import { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; 2→import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; 3→import { useReducedMotion } from "framer-motion"; 4→import gsap from "gsap"; 5→import { ScrollTrigger } from "gsap/ScrollTrigger"; 6→import { Award, Handshake, Laptop2, UsersRound, MapPin, Users, Heart } from "lucide-react"; 7→import Button from "../components/ui/Button"; 8→import Container from "../components/ui/Container"; 9→import CountdownTimer from "../components/ui/CountdownTimer"; 10→import PageSection from "../components/sections/PageSection"; 11→import JudgeCard from "../components/sections/JudgeCard"; 12→import SponsorCard from "../components/sections/SponsorCard"; 13→import FeatureCard from "../components/ui/FeatureCard"; 14→import Timeline from "../components/ui/Timeline"; 15→import FaqAccordion from "../components/ui/FaqAccordion"; 16→ 17→const aboutHighlights = [ 18→ { 19→ title: "天津首个本地化黑客松", 20→ description: 21→ "具备强烈的城市符号和媒体关注度，立足天津，渤海起航，欢迎每一个身处天津或愿意为天津而来的创造者。", 22→ icon: MapPin 23→ }, 24→ { 25→ title: "覆盖高质量参与者", 26→ description: 27→ "覆盖天津及周边城市高校学生、年轻开发者、AI初创企业等高质量参与者，汇聚创新力量。", 28→ icon: Users 29→ }, 30→ { 31→ title: "纯粹平等，公益透明", 32→ description: 33→ "公益性质，财务透明，采取 Build in public 的形式，将赞助费 100% 用于参赛者和体验者，让技术和创造本身成为主角。", 34→ icon: Heart 35→ } 36→]; 37→ 38→const featureItems = [ 39→ { 40→ title: "丰厚奖金与荣誉", 41→ description: 42→ "总奖金池 50 万元人民币，覆盖最佳技术实现、最佳社会影响等多个奖项，团队与个人都能获得舞台与曝光。", 43→ icon: Award 44→ }, 45→ { 46→ title: "行业大咖与导师", 47→ description: 48→ "来自 Stripe、Vercel、OpenAI 等公司的评委与导师全程陪伴，针对产品策略、架构设计和融资路径提供即时建议。", 49→ icon: UsersRound 50→ }, 51→ { 52→ title: "技术工作坊", 53→ description: 54→ "赛前一周推出密集型 Workshop，包含 AI 应用快速落地、前端性能优化与产品叙事训练，帮助团队快速对齐方向。", 55→ icon: Laptop2 56→ }, 57→ { 58→ title: "结识优秀伙伴", 59→ description: 60→ "200+ 参赛者覆盖前端、后端、设计、商业等背景，Hack 期间的社交与配对环节将促成更多长期合作。", 61→ icon: Handshake 62→ } 63→]; 64→ 65→const judges = [ 66→ { 67→ name: "Luna Zhang", 68→ title: "Stripe 资深产品技术总监", 69→ bio: "负责全球支付体验与新产品探索，专注打造以开发者为中心的产品生态。" 70→ }, 71→ { 72→ name: "Leo Chen", 73→ title: "Linear 创始成员 / 工程负责人", 74→ bio: "擅长快速构建高性能前端应用，并倡导以设计驱动的团队协作模式。" 75→ }, 76→ { 77→ name: "Mia Xu", 78→ title: "Rebase Capital 合伙人", 79→ bio: "长期关注早期创新项目投资，重点布局 AI for Good 与未来出行领域。" 80→ }, 81→ { 82→ name: "Aaron Wu", 83→ title: "Vercel 亚太区解决方案架构负责人", 84→ bio: "致力于帮助团队打造快如即时的前端体验，并推动 Edge 架构在企业场景落地。" 85→ } 86→]; 87→ 88→const sponsors = [ 89→ { name: "Vercel", tier: "战略合作" }, 90→ { name: "Stripe", tier: "铂金赞助" }, 91→ { name: "Notion", tier: "铂金赞助" }, 92→ { name: "OpenAI", tier: "黄金赞助" }, 93→ { name: "Segment", tier: "黄金赞助" }, 94→ { name: "Linear", tier: "白银赞助" } 95→]; 96→ 97→const timelineSteps = [ 98→ { 99→ title: "Step 1 · 立即报名", 100→ date: "即日起 - 2025 年 10 月 25 日", 101→ description: "提交个人或团队信息，选择意向赛道，我们将在 48 小时内确认参赛资格。" 102→ }, 103→ { 104→ title: "Step 2 · 组队与创意", 105→ date: "2025 年 10 月 26 日 - 11 月 1 日", 106→ description: "参加线上配对活动，与潜在队友打磨创意，并提前预约导师方向。" 107→ }, 108→ { 109→ title: "Step 3 · 48 小时开发", 110→ date: "2025 年 11 月 8 - 10 日", 111→ description: "在天津高教科创园集中开发，我们提供现场设备、餐饮与技术支持。" 112→ }, 113→ { 114→ title: "Step 4 · 项目提交", 115→ date: "2025 年 11 月 10 日 18:00", 116→ description: "提交最终 Demo、文档与演示材料，评审组将进行初筛与评分。" 117→ }, 118→ { 119→ title: "Step 5 · 路演与评审", 120→ date: "2025 年 11 月 10 日 19:00", 121→ description: "入围团队现场路演，评委提问点评，最终公布获奖名单与颁奖。" 122→ } 123→]; 124→ 125→const faqItems = [ 126→ { 127→ question: "谁可以参加 BoHack？", 128→ answer: 129→ "BoHack 欢迎开发者、设计师、产品经理及任何热爱创新的人参与。我们建议组建跨职能团队，但个人报名也可以在活动现场寻找队友。" 130→ }, 131→ { 132→ question: "活动是线上还是线下？", 133→ answer: 134→ "本届 BoHack 全程线下举行，地点位于天开高教科创园。我们提供 24 小时开放的黑客空间与完善的后勤保障。" 135→ }, 136→ { 137→ question: "需要提前准备代码或方案吗？", 138→ answer: 139→ "为了公平起见，核心代码与设计需在活动期间完成。你可以提前准备常用组件库或调研资料，现场导师会帮助你快速起步。" 140→ }, 141→ { 142→ question: "我没有队友怎么办？", 143→ answer: 144→ "报名后可参与官方配对活动。我们还在开幕前安排破冰与创意墙，帮助你在现场快速找到志同道合的伙伴。" 145→ } 146→]; 147→ 148→const HomePage = () => { 149→ const prefersReducedMotion = useReducedMotion(); 150→ const pageRef = useRef(null); 151→ const heroSectionRef = useRef(null); 152→ const heroTitleRef = useRef(null); 153→ const parallaxImageRef = useRef(null); 154→ 155→ useEffect(() => { 156→ if (prefersReducedMotion) return; 157→ 158→ gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger); 159→ 160→ let ctx: gsap.Context | null = null; 161→ 162→ // Add a small delay to ensure DOM is fully ready 163→ const timer = setTimeout(() => { 164→ ctx = gsap.context(() => { 165→ // Check if elements exist before animating 166→ if (heroTitleRef.current) { 167→ gsap.fromTo( 168→ heroTitleRef.current, 169→ { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, 170→ { 171→ opacity: 1, 172→ y: 0, 173→ duration: 1.1, 174→ ease: "power3.out", 175→ scrollTrigger: { 176→ trigger: heroTitleRef.current, 177→ scroller: "[data-scroll-container]", 178→ start: "top 80%", 179→ toggleActions: "play none none none" 180→ } 181→ } 182→ ); 183→ } 184→ 185→ if (parallaxImageRef.current) { 186→ gsap.to(parallaxImageRef.current, { 187→ y: -80, 188→ ease: "none", 189→ scrollTrigger: { 190→ trigger: parallaxImageRef.current, 191→ scroller: "[data-scroll-container]", 192→ start: "top bottom", 193→ end: "bottom top", 194→ scrub: true 195→ } 196→ }); 197→ } 198→ 199→ const sections = gsap.utils.toArray( 200→ "[data-scroll-section].js-fade-section" 201→ ); 202→ 203→ sections.forEach((section) => { 204→ if (!section || section === heroSectionRef.current) return; 205→ 206→ gsap.fromTo( 207→ section, 208→ { autoAlpha: 0, y: 80 }, 209→ { 210→ autoAlpha: 1, 211→ y: 0, 212→ duration: 1, 213→ ease: "power2.out", 214→ scrollTrigger: { 215→ trigger: section, 216→ scroller: "[data-scroll-container]", 217→ start: "top 85%", 218→ toggleActions: "play none none reverse" 219→ } 220→ } 221→ ); 222→ }); 223→ }, pageRef); 224→ }, 100); 225→ 226→ return () => { 227→ clearTimeout(timer); 228→ if (ctx) { 229→ ctx.revert(); 230→ } 231→ ScrollTrigger.getAll().forEach(trigger => trigger.kill()); 232→ }; 233→ }, [prefersReducedMotion]); 234→ 235→ return ( 236→

content.text:
## Analysis Complete

I've identified the root cause of why changes to HomePage.tsx are not being reflected in the running application:

### Key Findings:

**1. DUPLICATE FILES - The Main Issue:**
- **C:\code\bohack\bo-hack-frontend\src\pages\HomePage.tsx** (TypeScript source - 463 lines)
- **C:\code\bohack\bo-hack-frontend\src\pages\HomePage.js** (Compiled JavaScript - 202 lines)

**2. The Problem:**
The application is importing from the COMPILED .js file instead of the TypeScript .tsx source file. When you edit HomePage.tsx, the changes don't appear because:
- The routing system (AppRoutes.js) imports from "../pages/HomePage" 
- JavaScript module resolution prioritizes .js files over .tsx files
- The .js file is a pre-compiled/transpiled version that's outdated

**3. Build Configuration:**
- vite.config.ts is properly configured
- TypeScript is set up correctly (tsconfig.json)
- The issue is that compiled .js files exist alongside .tsx source files

**4. Additional Compiled Files Found:**
The git status shows many .js files that appear to be compiled versions of .tsx files:
- src/App.js (compiled from App.tsx)
- src/main.js (compiled from main.tsx)
- src/routes/AppRoutes.js (compiled from AppRoutes.tsx)
- And many more component files

### Root Cause:
The project has both TypeScript source files (.tsx) and their compiled JavaScript versions (.js) in the same directories. The JavaScript files are taking precedence during module resolution, causing your TypeScript edits to be ignored.

### Solution:
You need to delete all the compiled .js files from the src directory. These should not be committed to the repository - they should only exist in the dist folder after building. The .js files are likely there from a previous build process or incorrect TypeScript compilation setup.
